topic: PM Modi on nepal's new constitution
text: Nepal's Gen Z leaders call for corruption-free future, seek closer ties with India. In an exclusive interview with India Today TV, Nepal Gen Z core committee members Tanaka Dhami and Arjun Shahi said the movement was aimed at pushing for a corruption-free political system and better opportunities for young Nepalese. Read what they have to say about the deadly protests and the future of the nation.
